title: The Gary Null Show
content:
Health Updates: radiation #1 cause of tobacco related cancers; curcumin; cognitive therapy, exercise better than drug... <!--more--> therapy for breast cancer; emergency preparedness.
Commentary: “Go Left:” The Season Has Changed — Is It Time for an OWS “Spring Offensive?” [Danny Schechter] Issues in the News: “Monsanto’s Roundup is Killing Human Kidney Cells” [Anthony Gucciardi NaturalSociety 15Mar12] “Coal Ash More Radioactive Than Nuclear Waste” [Mara Hvistendahl- Scientific American] “5 Deadly Threats to Our Precious Drinking Water Supply” [Tara Lohan 21Mar12 www.alternet.org]
